title: IsleNet: Island Shrinkage Detection via Remote Sensing
description: Deep learning framework using satellite imagery with U-Net segmentation to detect and forecast island shrinkage, visualized through a Streamlit dashboard.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Responsive personal portfolio website with dynamic project loading, dark mode toggle, and GitHub API integration.

title: Recipe Health Analysis Project
description: Data-driven recipe health scoring system analyzing nutrition and ingredients using machine learning to predict healthiness ratings.

title: Jeanotype: AI Fashion Style Classifier
description: CNN-based machine learning model that classifies outfit styles from images using feature extraction and clustering to identify fashion patterns.

title: Superhero Movie Sequel Prediction
description: Machine learning model predicting superhero movie sequels using IMDb and box office data with logistic regression and Random Forest classifiers.

title: NSF HDR iHARP Machine Learning Challenge
description: Analyzed 20 years of sea-level data using Random Forests to detect anomalies and improve prediction accuracy by 20%.

title: Duolingo Review Analysis
description: Sentiment analysis of 2,500+ Duolingo reviews using SQL and Python, visualized through Tableau dashboards.

title: DiamondHack: Search & Rescue Website
description: Responsive search-and-rescue website developed during a 48-hour hackathon with enhanced accessibility features.

title: Age-Based Digital Divide Research
description: Research analyzing technology use among 60 elderly participants, visualized through Power BI to highlight the digital divide.
